:: Wolfgang ::

:: While flying towards the Iron Fist, curiosity takes the best of Wolfgang.
He flies back to the battlefield, making sure that Masabot couldn't see him.
He wanted to observe his apprentice's  struggle to survive.  Wolgang lands
behind a small clearing.  He knew that everyone besides Masabot would most
likely be able to see him. ::
